title: Congressman Denver Riggleman  on Big Tech & Crypto
itunes:title: Congressman Denver Riggleman  on Big Tech & Crypto
description:
Kevin spoke with Colin Reed, GOP Strategist & Managing Director at Definers Public Affairs, and Luis Miranda, Former DNC Communications Director. They discussed Facebook's Lira cryptocurrency, big tech, President Trump defending his attacks on Democratic Congresswomen and the topic of racism.

Kevin also spoke with Congressman Denver Riggleman of Virginia's 5th district to preview crypto's House Financial Services hearing Wednesday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
